// src/components/sections/About.tsx // Version without framer-motion dependency import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react' import ownerImage from '../../assets/images/' const About: React.FC = () => { const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false) const sectionRef = useRef(null) useEffect(() => { const observer = new IntersectionObserver( ([entry]) => { if (entry.isIntersecting) { setIsVisible(true) } }, { threshold: 0.1 } ) if (sectionRef.current) { observer.observe(sectionRef.current) } return () => { if (sectionRef.current) { observer.unobserve(sectionRef.current) } } }, []) return (
{/* Image */}
{/* Content */}

About the Founder

Hi, I'm Catalina M, the heart behind Sorted & Organized Spaces by CM.

Organizing isn't just something I do — it's who I am. Since I was a child, I've had a natural passion for bringing order and harmony to the spaces around me. There's something deeply satisfying about transforming a cluttered room into a calm, functional space — and I've made it my mission to share that joy with others.

By day, I work in Human Resources, where I help people grow in their careers and find clarity in their goals. But outside of that, I follow my heart — organizing homes, pantries, offices, and more. What started as a hobby quickly grew into something more when a few wonderful friends trusted me to reorganize their pantries. Their encouragement lit the spark that led to the creation of this business.

One of the best parts of this journey is sharing it with my beautiful daughter, who often helps me with the business. Together, we bring care, creativity, and attention to detail into every project.

Whether it's a single closet or an entire office space, my goal is to help you feel more at peace in your environment. I truly believe that when your space is organized, your mind and life feel more balanced too.

Thanks for stopping by — I can't wait to help you create a space that works for you.

sortedorganizedbycm@gmail.com 612.308.4781
) } export default About
